summary: Implements a mock AWS MediaConnect service, defining custom exceptions, data models for flows and related resources, and helper functions that simulate MediaConnect API operations such as creating, updating, describing, starting, stopping, and deleting flows, sources, outputs, VPC interfaces, entitlements, and tags.
business_intent: Provides a testable inâ€‘memory replica of the MediaConnect service so developers can write and run unit or integration tests without making real calls to AWS, ensuring correct handling of MediaConnect resources and error conditions.
